questions.question: Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words: 'It is a male dominant society that exists in India
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words: 'First school of a child is home'
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words: 'Are the techno schools we get to see today increase children’s pressure?'
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words: 'Do sports improve a child’s personality?'
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words: 'Should we have restrictions on children’s usage of internet?'
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words: 'Telangana to tax vehicles from Andhra, what is your opinion?'

Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words: 'Indian Government has banned the Nirbhaya documentary. Do you think banning the documentary was right? What is more important- an open discussion about such issues or banning them to protect the image of the country?'

Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words: 'After six years of trial, finally the Satyam scam accused have been convicted and sentenced to prison. However, a lot of rich and powerful culprits have had an easy way out. Do you think our judicial system is strong enough to punish all the rich and influential culprits?'

Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words: 'Our government rewards players who succeed. But forgets to encourage players who have the potential to succeed. Do you agree?'
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words: 'Is Swatch Bharat Programme a success?'
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words: 'Why does India have a problematic relationship with almost all its neighbours?'
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words: 'Will the ‘Make in India’ boost our economy or will it discourage foreign trade?'
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words: 'Traditional classroom teaching methodology vs e-learning'
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words: 'Is money the biggest motivator for employees?'
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words: 'Should social service be a compulsory part of our education system?'
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words: 'Who is responsible for eve teasing- boy or girl?'

Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words: 'Should government take responsibility for problems in agriculture sector given that nature too has a major role in it?'
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words: 'IPL is a dirty mix of sport and money.'
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words: 'Morals and values don’t allow us to succeed in work life?'
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words: 'Delhi Government has decided not to allow media in to their assembly. Do you support this move?'
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words: 'Has health care system in India improved?'
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words: 'Should the government regulate fees in private schools and colleges?'
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words: 'Should Indian government ban cosmetics to encourage use of traditional beauty products such as Shikakai, haldi etc..?'
Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words: 'Is Ayurveda better than Allopathy?'

Write an essay to explain your views on the issue given below in 100-150 words: 'People are being recruited to settle on Mars. Do you think it is a good idea to step on other planets and destroy them just like earth?'
